strings.Value: [Lure Evindra into a trap] "Evindra, my advisor Tsanna needs the advice of someone who knows the First World well. She is up ahead, waiting not far from here. Will you help?"
[Warn Evindra] "I have to warn you — Tsanna, a priestess of Lamashtu, has chosen you as a sacrifice for her goddess."
{n}Evindra stops what she's doing and looks up at you with her big sad eyes.{/n} "Can I do something to help?"
"No one truly knows the {g|First World}First World{/g}, even I who was born and raised here. But I will help as well as I can. This is what I'm here for."
"Of course, this is a pointless wish, but nevertheless — please be careful. The {g|Eldest}Eldest{/g} is the foe of foes. His power can only be matched by his guile..."

{n}The nereid flinches.{/n} "{g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu's{/g} sacrifice! I'm sure I would be gone forever, if that horrendous deity claimed my life.
Thank you for warning me... I will be careful. Anyway, I must live to see your victory over the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g} — and see his crown fall!"
